				Foundation Course-English 
				Core I-Financial Accounting 
				Core II-Business Communications

				Soft Skills - Essentials of Language and

				Non-major Elective


II Semester

				Soft Skill - Essentials of Language and Communication - Level II 
				Non-major Elective
